alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Fayette; Fayette Ridges; Greene; Indiana; Jefferson; Washington; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 12:41AM EST until January 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Spotty freezing rain, sleet and snow will transition to all snow after 2 AM. Moderate to briefly heavy periods of snow will overspread the area through 8 AM. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches are likely. * WHERE...Western and southwestern Pennsylvania into northern West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will remain slick and hazardous, especially where snow falls on top of existing ice accumulations. Plan on extremely slick road conditions, especially where untreated. Dangerous driving conditions will impact this morning`s commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
